群行: (ぐんこう) - carrying out in a large group
群論: (ぐんろん) - group theory; theory of groups
群速度: (ぐんそくど) - group velocity (in fibre optics, fiber optics)
群雄割拠: (ぐんゆうかっきょ) - (yoji) rivalry of local warlords; a number of powerful (talented, influential) persons standing by themselves in a given field
群集: (ぐんしゅう) - group (of living things); crowd; community
群集心理: (ぐんしゅうしんり) - mass or mob psychology
群集生態学: (ぐんしゅうせいたいがく) - synecology; community ecology
群集行動: (ぐんしゅうこうどう) - crowd behavior; crowd behaviour
群雲: (むらくも) - gathering clouds; group of clouds
群鴉: (むらがらす) - flock of crows; murder of crows
義: (gi) - righteousness , morality, righteousness, justice, honour (honor); meaning; teachings, doctrine; nonconsanguineous relationship (ou seja, de sogros)
義を破る: (ぎをやぶる) - to break faith with
義を見てせざるは勇なきなり: (ぎをみてせざるはゆうなきなり) - Knowing what is right and not doing it is a want of courage
義兄弟: (ぎきょうだい) - brother-in-law; stepbrother; sworn brother
義兵: (ぎへい) - soldier or army dedicated to a righteous cause
義務を課す: (ぎむをかす) - to place an obligation; to impose a duty; to obligate
義務的経費: (ぎむてきけいひ) - mandatory expense; required expenses
義和団: (ぎわだん) - (in Chinese history) the Boxers
義太夫: (ぎだゆう) - gidayuu (type of reciting used in the puppet theater)
義太夫節: (ぎだゆうぶし) - gidayuu ballad drama (narrative accompanied by a shamisen used in the bunraku puppet theater)
義妹: (gimai) - sister-in-law (irmã mais nova do cônjuge ou esposa do irmão mais novo); younger stepsister, younger adopted sister, non-blood-related younger sister
義捐: (ぎえん) - alms; donation (esp. disaster relief or charity); contribution
義捐金: (ぎえんきん) - donation money (esp. disaster relief or charity); contribution
義援: (ぎえん) - alms; donation (esp. disaster relief or charity); contribution
義援金: (ぎえんきん) - donation money (esp. disaster relief or charity); contribution
義母: (ぎぼ) - mother-in-law; foster mother; step mother
義理: (ぎり) - duty/sense of duty/honor/honour/decency/courtesy/debt of gratitude/social obligation; in-law/relation by marriage
義理が悪い: (ぎりがわるい) - failing in one's duty (e.g. to someone)
義理にも: (ぎりにも) - (often with negative verb) in all conscience; in honour; in duty bound
義理のお兄さん: (ぎりのおにいさん) - one's brother-in-law
義理の母: (ぎりのはは) - mother-in-law; foster mother; stepmother
義理の父: (ぎりのちち) - father-in-law; foster father; stepfather
義理まん: (ぎりまん) - sexual intercourse permitted (by a woman) due to a sense of obligation (rather than desire)
義理を欠く: (ぎりをかく) - to fail in one's social duties
義理を立てる: (ぎりをたてる) - to be faithful; to do one's duty
義理マン: (ぎりマン) - sexual intercourse permitted (by a woman) due to a sense of obligation (rather than desire)
義理一遍: (ぎりいっぺん) - (yoji) perfunctory; going-through-the-motions-sort of (invitation, gift, etc.)
義理人情: (ぎりにんじょう) - (yoji) duty and humanity; (a sense of) moral obligation and humane feelings
義理堅い: (ぎりがたい) - possessed of a strong sense of duty
義経千本桜: (よしつねせんぼんざくら) - Yoshitsune Senbonzakura (kabuki play)
義義: (ギギ) - forktail bullhead (species of catfish, Pelteobagrus nudiceps)
義肢装具士: (ぎしそうぐし) - prosthetist and orthotist
義蜂: (ギバチ) - cut-tailed bullhead (species of catfish, Pseudobagrus aurantiacus)
